sentences.chinese: 对不起——你能再说一遍吗？

sentences.english: It is not, I repeat not, my fault.
sentences.chinese: 那不是我的错，我再说一遍，不是。

sentences.english: It was a terrible journey - I hope we don’t have a repeat performance (= have the same thing happen again ) on the way home.
sentences.chinese: 这一路上太糟糕了——我希望回程可不要再发生同样的事。

detailed_translations.english: to say or write something again
an event that is very like something that happened before

sentences.english: He carefully explained the procedure.
sentences.chinese: 他仔细解释了程序。

detailed_translations.english: to tell someone about something in a way that is clear or easy to understand

sentences.english: Where do those kids get their energy from?
sentences.chinese: 那些孩子哪来这么多精力？

sentences.english: I really put a lot of energy into what I do.
sentences.chinese: 我做起事来总是投入很大精力。

sentences.english: kinetic energy
sentences.chinese: 动能

detailed_translations.english: the physical and mental strength that makes you able to do things

sentences.english: cancer cells
sentences.chinese: 癌细胞

sentences.english: Embryos grow by cell division (= the splitting of cells ) .
sentences.chinese: 胚胎通过细胞分裂而成长。

detailed_translations.english: the smallest part of a living thing that can exist independently

sentences.english: Westerly gales forced the ship off course.
sentences.chinese: 强劲的西风将那艘船吹离了航道。

sentences.english: Firemen entering the building were forced back by flames.
sentences.chinese: 冲进大楼的消防队员被火焰挡了回来。

sentences.english: She tried to keep the door shut but the man forced it open .
sentences.chinese: 她不想打开门，但那男人硬是把它推开了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 强迫；用力推动，用力打开
detailed_translations.english: to make someone or something move in a particular direction or into a different position, especially through or using great strength

detailed_translations.chinese: 军队， 兵力； 暴力， 武力； 力， 力气； 影响力， 效力
detailed_translations.english: military action used as a way of achieving your aims

sentences.english: Ice needs heat to melt.
sentences.chinese: 冰需要热才能融化。

sentences.english: Insulating the attic is a good way to reduce heat loss.
sentences.chinese: 为阁楼安装隔热层是减少热量流失的好方法。

sentences.english: The heat was making them tired.
sentences.chinese: 炎热的天气令他们疲倦。

sentences.english: Heat the milk until it boils.
sentences.chinese: 把牛奶煮开。

detailed_translations.english: warmth or the quality of being hot
to make something become warm or hot

sentences.english: She was in constant physical pain.
sentences.chinese: 她一直感到身上疼痛。

sentences.english: the physical and emotional needs of young adults
sentences.chinese: 青年人的身心需求

sentences.english: people with severe physical disabilities
sentences.chinese: 身体重度残疾的人

sentences.english: Don’t be put off by his physical appearance .
sentences.chinese: 别因为他的外貌讨厌他。

sentences.english: He was obsessed with physical fitness .
sentences.chinese: 他对健身着了迷。

detailed_translations.english: related to someone’s body rather than their mind or emotions

sentences.english: The paper’s leading article (=  the main article  ) described the government as weak.
sentences.chinese: 该报社论称政府软弱。

sentences.english: newspaper articles
sentences.chinese: 报纸上的文章

sentences.english: household articles
sentences.chinese: 家居用品

sentences.english: Article 1 of the constitution guarantees freedom of religion.
sentences.chinese: 宪法的第一条保障宗教信仰自由。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of writing about a particular subject in a newspaper or magazine

sentences.english: Nothing ever seems to upset him.
sentences.chinese: 似乎从来没有什么事情会使他烦恼。

sentences.english: Have you ever been to Paris?
sentences.chinese: 你去过巴黎吗？

sentences.english: I don’t think I’ve ever been here before.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得我以前从未到过这里。

sentences.english: It was raining harder than ever.
sentences.chinese: 当时下着前所未有的大雨。

detailed_translations.english: used in negative sentences and questions, or sentences with if to mean ‘at any time’

sentences.english: We could hear the neighbours arguing.
sentences.chinese: 我们听到邻居在争吵。

detailed_translations.english: to disagree with someone in words, often in an angry way
to persuade someone to do or not do something

sentences.english: He's good at dealing with pressure.
sentences.chinese: 他善于应付压力。

detailed_translations.english: to solve a problem, perform a task, etc.

sentences.english: Recent stock market losses point to trouble ahead.
sentences.chinese: 最近股市的下跌预示着未来将有麻烦。

detailed_translations.english: problems or difficulties
to say something or ask someone to do something which may use or waste their time or upset them

sentences.english: an unusual feature
sentences.chinese: 不寻常的特点

sentences.english: unusual circumstances
sentences.chinese: 异常状况

sentences.english: It’s unusual for Dave to be late.
sentences.chinese: 戴夫迟到是很少见的。

sentences.english: (= it is quite common ) to feel very angry in a situation like this.
sentences.chinese: 遇到这样的情况觉得非常生气是很正常的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不平常的， 少有的； 独特的， 与众不同的
detailed_translations.english: different from what is usual or normal

sentences.english: She had a big argument with her husband.
sentences.chinese: 她和丈夫大吵了一架。

sentences.english: We need to provide a convincing argument as to why the system should be changed.
sentences.chinese: 我们得提出有说服力的论据，证明为何要改变体制。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which two or more people disagree, often angrily

name: hold out
trans: 递出东西，伸出手(或胳膊)

sentences.english: One prisoner was still holding out on the roof of the jail.
sentences.chinese: 一名囚犯仍在监狱的屋顶上拒不投降。

detailed_translations.english: If you hold out, you manage to resist an enemy or opponent in difficult circumstances and refuse to give in

sentences.english: A vast crowd gathered in the main square.
sentences.chinese: 主广场上聚集了一大群人。

sentences.english: She mingled with the crowd of guests, exchanging greetings.
sentences.chinese: 她穿梭在宾客中间和他们打招呼。

sentences.english: Saturday’s game was watched by a capacity crowd (= the maximum number of people that a sports ground etc can hold ) .
sentences.chinese: 星期六的比赛座无虚席。

sentences.english: Troops fired tear gas and shots to disperse a crowd of 15,000 demonstrators.
sentences.chinese: 军队发射催泪弹并开枪来驱散15,000名示威群众。

sentences.english: I didn’t know him; he wasn’t one of the usual crowd.
sentences.chinese: 我不认识他，他不是平时那一群人里的。

sentences.english: He wanted to go unnoticed, to be one of the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 他想默默无闻地做个普通人。

detailed_translations.english: a large group of people who have gathered together to do something, for example to watch something or protest about something

sentences.english: She sat there staring into space (= looking for a long time at nothing ) .
sentences.chinese: 她坐在那里，出神地凝视前方。

detailed_translations.english: to look at something or someone for a long time without moving your eyes, for example because you are surprised, angry, or bored

name: through
trans: prep从…一端至另一端，穿过，贯穿

sentences.english: How many working days were lost through sickness last year?
sentences.chinese: 去年因为员工生病损失了多少个工作日？

detailed_translations.english: because of something

sentences.english: Rosa shut the door quietly.
sentences.chinese: 罗莎悄悄关上门。

sentences.english: ‘I’m sorry,’ she said quietly.
sentences.chinese: “对不起。”她轻声说道。

sentences.english: a quietly-spoken man (= one who always speaks quietly )
sentences.chinese: 说话轻柔的男人

detailed_translations.english: without making much noise

sentences.english: Boys broke into a shop and stole £45 in cash.
sentences.chinese: 男孩们闯进一家商店，盗走了45英镑现金。

detailed_translations.english: to take something that belongs to someone else
to be very cheap

sentences.english: I locked the door and dropped the keys in my purse.
sentences.chinese: 我锁上门，然后把钥匙丢进手提包里。

detailed_translations.chinese: (女士)手提袋；(国家、家庭、团体等的) 财力
detailed_translations.english: a bag in which a woman carries her money and personal things
if you purse your lips, you bring them together tightly into a small circle, especially to show disapproval or doubt

sentences.english: Don’t forget to send us a postcard!
sentences.chinese: 别忘了给我们寄张明信片！

detailed_translations.english: a card that can be sent in the post without an envelope, especially one with a picture on it

sentences.english: We went through the gate into the orchard.
sentences.chinese: 我们穿过大门进了果园。

sentences.english: the wrought-iron gates of the palace
sentences.chinese: 宫殿的锻铁大门

detailed_translations.english: the part of a fence or outside wall that you can open and close so that you can enter or leave a place
to provide with a gate or gates

name: aboard
trans: adv上船(或飞机、公共汽车、火车等)

sentences.english: The plane crashed, killing all 200 people aboard.
sentences.chinese: 飞机失事，机上200人全部遇难。

sentences.english: The boat swayed as he stepped aboard.
sentences.chinese: 他上船时，船晃了起来。

detailed_translations.chinese: 在飞机上；[船] 在船上；在火车上
detailed_translations.english: on or onto a ship, plane, or train
on or onto a ship, plane, or train

name: go after
trans: 追赶某人，跟在某人后面

sentences.english: a strange city
sentences.chinese: 陌生的城市

sentences.english: strange noises
sentences.chinese: 奇怪的噪声

sentences.english: Does Geoff’s behaviour seem strange to you?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得杰夫的行为反常吗？

sentences.english: She felt there was something strange about Dexter’s voice.
sentences.chinese: 她觉得德克斯特的声音有点奇怪。

sentences.english: Isn’t it strange how animals seem to sense danger?
sentences.chinese: 动物似乎能感觉到危险，这不是很奇怪吗？

sentences.english: It’s strange that we’ve never met before.
sentences.chinese: 很奇怪，我们以前居然从来没有碰见过。

sentences.english: For some strange reason, I slept like a baby despite the noise.
sentences.chinese: 很奇怪，不知为什么，尽管很吵闹，但我仍睡得很香。

sentences.english: Strange as it may seem, I actually prefer cold weather.
sentences.chinese: 听上去也许很奇怪，我竟然喜欢冷天。

sentences.english: That’s strange. I was sure Jude was right here a second ago.
sentences.chinese: 真奇怪，我肯定祖德刚刚还在这儿的。

sentences.english: The strange thing is all four victims had red hair.
sentences.chinese: 令人奇怪的是，四名受害者都是红头发的。

detailed_translations.english: not familiar because you have not been there before or met the person before

sentences.english: The lighted dial of her watch said 1.20.
sentences.chinese: 她手表上的夜光表面显示时间为1点20分。

sentences.english: I think I dialed the wrong number.
sentences.chinese: 我想我拨错号码了。

detailed_translations.english: the round part of a clock, watch, machine etc that has numbers that show you the time or a measurement
to press the buttons or turn the dial on a telephone in order to make a telephone call

sentences.english: There have been a number of thefts in the area.
sentences.chinese: 该地区发生了几宗偷窃案。

sentences.english: the theft of £150 from the office
sentences.chinese: 办公室150英镑失窃

detailed_translations.english: an act of stealing something

name: detail
trans: n(关于某事物的)资料，信息

sentences.english: This issue will be discussed in more detail in Chapter 5.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题将在第五章里作更为详细的论述。

detailed_translations.english: a single feature, fact, or piece of information about something
to list things or give all the facts or information about something

sentences.english: She gave me a worried look.
sentences.chinese: 她担心地看了我一眼。

sentences.english: His parents must be worried sick (= extremely worried ) .
sentences.chinese: 他的父母肯定担心死了。

detailed_translations.english: unhappy because you keep thinking about a problem, or about something bad that might happen

sentences.english: It took us a while to realize the extent of the tragedy.
sentences.chinese: 我们过了一段时间才意识到这场悲剧有多严重。

sentences.english: It was only later that I realized my mistake.
sentences.chinese: 我到后来才认识到自己的错误。

sentences.english: She never realized her ambition of winning an Olympic gold medal.
sentences.chinese: 中文例句:她一直未能实现赢取奥运会金牌的抱负。

detailed_translations.english: to know and understand something, or suddenly begin to understand it

sentences.english: Neither country is capable of fighting a long war .
sentences.chinese: 两个国家都没有能力打持久战。

sentences.english: Later the Indians fought the Anglo settlers.
sentences.chinese: 后来，印第安人跟英国殖民者打起了仗。

sentences.english: She fought her way back into the first team.
sentences.chinese: 她奋力拼搏，又回到了第一团队。

sentences.english: The men were fighting for higher wages.
sentences.chinese: 那些人在争取加薪。

detailed_translations.english: to take part in a war or battle

sentences.english: I grew up in rather unusual circumstances.
sentences.chinese: 我在相当不寻常的环境中长大。

sentences.english: I'm afraid it's a rather long story.
sentences.chinese: 我恐怕这是个相当长的故事。

sentences.english: I’d rather have a quiet night in front of the TV.
sentences.chinese: 我宁愿晚上安安静静地看看电视。

detailed_translations.english: fairly or to some degree

sentences.english: Rosie ran downstairs to answer the door.
sentences.chinese: 罗茜跑下楼去开门。

sentences.english: Charles was downstairs in the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 查尔斯在楼下厨房里。

sentences.english: She repainted the downstairs rooms and closed off the second floor.
sentences.chinese: 她重新粉刷了楼下的房间，并把二楼封上了。

detailed_translations.english: towards or on a lower floor of a building, especially a house
Downstairs means situated on the ground floor of a building or on a lower floor than you are
the rooms on the ground floor in a house

sentences.english: The book is divided into six sections.
sentences.chinese: 本书分为六部分。

sentences.english: The money will be divided equally among the charities.
sentences.chinese: 这笔钱将被平分给各慈善机构。

detailed_translations.english: if something divides, or if you divide it, it separates into two or more parts

sentences.english: Newspapers vary in the degree to which they emphasize propaganda rather than information.
sentences.chinese: 报纸重宣传轻资讯的程度各不相同。

detailed_translations.english: the level or amount of something

sentences.english: I never liked long walks, especially in winter.
sentences.chinese: 我向来不喜欢长距离散步，尤其在冬天。

sentences.english: Art books are expensive to produce, especially if they contain colour illustrations.
sentences.chinese: 美术类书籍制作成本很高，尤其是那些带彩色插图的。

sentences.english: I was especially fond of chocolate biscuits.
sentences.chinese: 我特别爱吃巧克力饼干。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize that something is more important or happens more with one particular thing than with others

sentences.english: These instruments calculate distances precisely.
sentences.chinese: 这些仪器计算距离非常精确。

detailed_translations.chinese: 计算， 推算； 计划， 打算
detailed_translations.english: to find out how much something will cost, how long something will take etc, by using numbers

sentences.english: Messages from the brain are carried by the central nervous system.
sentences.chinese: 大脑发出的信息是通过中枢神经系统传递的。

sentences.english: the chemistry of the brain
sentences.chinese: 大脑的化学性质

sentences.english: the human brain
sentences.chinese: 人脑

sentences.english: She died of a brain tumour.
sentences.chinese: 她死于脑瘤。

sentences.english: The job requires brains.
sentences.chinese: 做这工作需要头脑。

detailed_translations.english: the organ inside your head that controls how you think, feel, and move

sentences.english: For part of the day, you will be outside doing practical work.
sentences.chinese: 你们每天将有一部分时间在户外实际操作。

sentences.english: Lay all the parts out before you start assembling the model.
sentences.chinese: 开始组装模型之前把所有的零件都摆放出来。

detailed_translations.english: a piece or feature of something such as an object, area, event, or period of time

sentences.english: How many languages do you speak?
sentences.chinese: 你能说几种语言？

sentences.english: one of the best-known poems in the English language
sentences.chinese: 最著名的英语诗歌之一

detailed_translations.english: a system of communication by written or spoken words, which is used by the people of a particular country or area

sentences.english: It took nearly two hours to get here.
sentences.chinese: 到这里花了将近两小时。

sentences.english: Michelle’s nearly twenty.
sentences.chinese: 米歇尔年近二十。

sentences.english: Is the job nearly finished?
sentences.chinese: 这工作快干完了吗？

sentences.english: Louise is nearly as tall as her mother.
sentences.chinese: 路易丝差不多和她母亲一样高。

sentences.english: I nearly always go home for lunch.
sentences.chinese: 我几乎总是回家吃午饭。

sentences.english: He very nearly died.
sentences.chinese: 他差点送命。

detailed_translations.english: almost, but not quite or not completely

sentences.english: an alarm system
sentences.chinese: 警报系统

sentences.english: a well-designed heating system
sentences.chinese: 设计良好的供暖系统

sentences.english: the digestive system
sentences.chinese: 消化系统

sentences.english: the railway system
sentences.chinese: 铁路系统

detailed_translations.chinese: 系统； 制度， 体制； 方法， 做法； 身体
detailed_translations.english: a group of related parts that work together as a whole for a particular purpose

sentences.english: Alexander Graham Bell invented the telephone in 1876.
sentences.chinese: 亚历山大 · 格雷厄姆 · 贝尔于1876年发明了电话。

detailed_translations.english: to make, design, or think of a new type of thing

sentences.english: Knowledge in the field of genetics has been developing very rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 遗传学领域的知识发展非常迅速。

sentences.english: Corsica has developed its economy around the tourist industry.
sentences.chinese: 科西嘉岛的经济是围绕旅游业发展起来的。

sentences.english: exercises to develop muscle strength
sentences.chinese: 锻炼肌肉力量的运动

sentences.english: He had developed a certain affection for me.
sentences.chinese: 他对我产生了一些好感。

sentences.english: The land was developed for low-cost housing.
sentences.chinese: 这块土地被开发建造廉价住宅。

detailed_translations.english: to gradually grow or become bigger, more advanced, stronger, etc.; to make sth do this

sentences.english: The invention of the computer has revolutionized the business world.
sentences.chinese: 电脑的发明使商界发生了根本变化。

sentences.english: They subsequently admitted that the story was pure invention.
sentences.chinese: 他们后来承认他们说的纯属虚构。

detailed_translations.chinese: 发明，创造；捏造， 假话
detailed_translations.english: the act of inventing something

sentences.english: In English we call it an abacus.
sentences.chinese: 在英语里我们叫它为一个算盘。

sentences.english: I could write on paper and use abacus for statistic.
sentences.chinese: 我可以用纸笔写作，要算统计时就打算盘。

sentences.english: In response to declining math skills among their students, some Japanese schools are bringing back an ancient calculating device - the abacus.
sentences.chinese: 为了改善学生日渐衰退的计算能力，日本的一些学校重新使用起一个古老的计算工具-算盘。

detailed_translations.english: a frame with small balls that can be slid along on thick wires, used for counting and calculating

sentences.english: The brochure tries to give a fair and accurate description of each hotel.
sentences.chinese: 该手册尽量公正、准确地介绍每一家酒店。

detailed_translations.english: correct and true in every detail

sentences.english: electronic games
sentences.chinese: 电子游戏

sentences.english: an electronic organizer (= a small piece of electronic equipment that you can use to record addresses, phone numbers etc )
sentences.chinese: 电子记事本

detailed_translations.english: electronic equipment, such as computers and televisions, uses electricity that has passed through computer chips, transistors etc

sentences.english: a pocket calculator
sentences.chinese: 一个袖珍计算器

detailed_translations.english: a small electronic machine that can add, multiply etc

sentences.english: Then the deal is that when you sell the house they subtract -you've got to pay this.
sentences.chinese: 那么当你售出房子后，他们会从中减去，这个余额，这就是你要付给他们的。

sentences.english: That is, if you find that a sensor consistently overestimates by a certain value, you can subtract that value before the final value is reported.
sentences.chinese: 也就是说，如果您发现某个传感器总是偏高于某个特定数值，那么就可以减去该数值后再报告最终的数值。

sentences.english: Thus, if you have staff activities in loops and want to run the above request, you need to ensure that you subtract only events which belong together.
sentences.chinese: 因此，如果您在循环中具有人员活动，并且想要运行以上的请求，那么您必须确保您只减去了属于一起的事件。

detailed_translations.english: to take a number or an amount from a larger number or amount

sentences.english: Children will learn to multiply in the second grade.
sentences.chinese: 儿童在二年级学习乘法。

detailed_translations.chinese: 乘；使增加；使繁殖；使相乘
detailed_translations.english: to do a calculation in which you add a number to itself a particular number of times

sentences.english: Interest rates fell by six percentage points (= 6% ) .
sentences.chinese: 利息下降了6个百分点。

sentences.english: The numbers are small in percentage terms (= when calculated as a percentage ) .
sentences.chinese: 按百分比来看，这些数字很小。

detailed_translations.english: an amount expressed as if it is part of a total which is 100

sentences.english: He was one of the most powerful men in Bohemia.
sentences.chinese: 他是波希米亚最有权势的人物之一。

sentences.english: a very influential and powerful family
sentences.chinese: 很有权势的家庭

sentences.english: a powerful speech
sentences.chinese: 有感染力的演讲

detailed_translations.english: a powerful person, organization, group etc is able to control and influence events and other people’s actions

sentences.english: The career I had worked so hard for was over in a flash.
sentences.chinese: 我为之付出如许辛劳和汗水的事业就在瞬间结束了。

sentences.english: Picture a school of fish swimming in one direction, and then in a flash, all the fish change direction. There is no leader giving directions.
sentences.chinese: 想像一下一群鱼朝着一个方向游泳的画面,然后一瞬间,所有的鱼在没有领队给出指示的情况下一起改变了游向.

sentences.english: Especially if you’re crying and in a lot of anguish, determine in a flash what’s worth keeping, and visualize it like this: you are a burning building.
sentences.chinese: 特别是当你在哭泣和特别痛苦时，找出值得保留的瞬间，像这样来想象：你是一栋正在燃烧的房子。

sentences.english: Cathy did a rough calculation.
sentences.chinese: 凯茜作了一个粗略的计算。

detailed_translations.english: the act or process of using numbers to find out an amount

sentences.english: You have your whole life ahead of you!
sentences.chinese: 你有一辈子要过呢！

sentences.english: His whole attitude bugs me.
sentences.chinese: 他的整个态度都让我讨厌。

sentences.english: We ate the whole cake in about ten minutes.
sentences.chinese: 大约十分钟的时间，我们就把整个蛋糕都给吃完了。

sentences.english: The whole thing (= everything about the situation ) just makes me sick.
sentences.chinese: 这一切简直让我恶心。

sentences.english: We just sat around and watched TV the whole time (= the only thing we did was watch television ).
sentences.chinese: 我们一直都只是坐着看看电视。

sentences.english: I don’t believe she’s telling us the whole story (= all the facts ).
sentences.chinese: 我认为她没有告诉我们全部实情。

sentences.english: It was months before the whole truth came out.
sentences.chinese: 几个月以后才真相大白。

detailed_translations.english: all of something
something that consists of a number of parts, but is considered as a single unit

sentences.english: It’s the sort of opportunity you see only once in a lifetime.
sentences.chinese: 这种机会你一辈子也只能碰到一次。

detailed_translations.english: the period of time during which someone is alive or something exists

sentences.english: There was a ladder propped up against the wall.
sentences.chinese: 有一把梯子靠在墙边。

sentences.english: sailing against the wind
sentences.chinese: 逆风航行

detailed_translations.english: next to and touching an upright surface, especially for support

sentences.english: He’s one of the greatest living composers.
sentences.chinese: 他是仍然健在的最伟大的作曲家之一。

sentences.english: The sun affects all living things (= people, animals, and plants ).
sentences.chinese: 太阳与一切生物息息相关。

sentences.english: a living language
sentences.chinese: 活语言，仍在使用的语言

sentences.english: It’s not a great job, but it’s a living.
sentences.chinese: 这不是什么了不起的工作，不过是一种生计。

detailed_translations.english: alive now
the way that you earn money or the money that you earn

sentences.english: There are many different cell types in the human body .
sentences.chinese: 人体中有许多种不同的细胞类型。

sentences.english: the power of the human mind
sentences.chinese: 人脑的威力

sentences.english: The desire for joy lies deep within the human spirit .
sentences.chinese: 对快乐的渴求藏在人类心灵深处。

sentences.english: Infra-red light is invisible to the human eye.
sentences.chinese: 红外线是人眼看不见的。

sentences.english: theories of human behaviour
sentences.chinese: 关于人类行为的理论

sentences.english: different areas of human experience
sentences.chinese: 人类各方面的经验

sentences.english: respect for the absolute value of human life
sentences.chinese: 对人类生命绝对价值的尊重

sentences.english: The accident was the result of human error.
sentences.chinese: 事故是由于人为过失造成的。

sentences.english: The meat was declared unfit for human consumption.
sentences.chinese: 这种肉被宣布不适合人类食用。

sentences.english: Like humans, cats and dogs are omnivores.
sentences.chinese: 和人类一样，猫和狗是杂食性动物。

detailed_translations.english: belonging to or relating to people, especially as opposed to machines or animals
a person

sentences.english: He was sick in the evening, but the following day he was better.
sentences.chinese: 那天晚上他生病了，但第二天就好一些了。

sentences.english: Write down the following information: name of product, type, date purchased and price.
sentences.chinese: 写下以下信息：产品名称、型号、购买日期和价格。

detailed_translations.english: the next afternoon, month etc

name: amazing
trans: adj令人惊奇的，令人惊喜的

sentences.english: He’s an amazing player to watch.
sentences.chinese: 看他比赛那才叫精彩呢。

sentences.english: an amazing bargain
sentences.chinese: 令人惊喜的便宜货

detailed_translations.english: very good, especially in an unexpected way

sentences.english: Charlie thinks money will solve all his problems.
sentences.chinese: 查理认为钱能解决他所有的问题。

sentences.english: the best way of solving our dilemma
sentences.chinese: 解决我们两难处境的最佳办法

sentences.english: attempts to solve a mathematical equation
sentences.chinese: 解数学方程式的尝试

detailed_translations.english: to find or provide a way of dealing with a problem

sentences.english: a lightning attack
sentences.chinese: 闪电式突袭

detailed_translations.english: very fast, and often without warning
a powerful flash of light in the sky caused by electricity and usually followed by thunder

sentences.english: Any large high-speed computer can be programmed to learn.
sentences.chinese: 任何大型高速计算机都可以通过编程获得学习能力。

detailed_translations.english: to give a computer a set of instructions that it can use to perform a particular operation

sentences.english: It is not within my power (= I am unable or not in a position) to help you.
sentences.chinese: 我是爱莫能助啊。

sentences.english: The ship was helpless against the power of the storm.
sentences.chinese: 那艘船只能任凭强大的暴风雨肆虐。

sentences.english: The Secretary of State has the power to approve the proposals.
sentences.chinese: 国务卿有权批准这些提议。

sentences.english: 4 to the power of 3 is 4^3 (= 4 × 4 × 4 = 64).
sentences.chinese: 4的3次方是4^3。

detailed_translations.english: the ability or right to control people or events

sentences.english: Students must complete the course.
sentences.chinese: 学生必须学完这门课程。

sentences.english: The building took two years to complete.
sentences.chinese: 这幢大楼花了两年时间才完工。

sentences.english: The darkness was almost complete.
sentences.chinese: 几乎是漆黑一片。

sentences.english: a complete stranger
sentences.chinese: 一个完全陌生的人

detailed_translations.english: to finish doing or making something, especially when it has taken a long time
used to emphasize that a quality or situation is as great as it could possibly be

sentences.english: Check the tiles carefully before you buy them.
sentences.chinese: 购买之前要把瓷砖仔细检查一下。

sentences.english: A first rule in solving any mystery is to check the facts.
sentences.chinese: 揭开谜团的第一条规则是核查事实。

sentences.english: The police are failing to take adequate measures to check the growth in crime.
sentences.chinese: 警方未能采取适当的措施来阻止犯罪率上升。

sentences.english: Conduct regular checks on your water quality.
sentences.chinese: 要经常检查水质。

detailed_translations.english: to do something in order to find out whether something really is correct, true, or in good condition
the process of finding out if something is safe, correct, true, or in the condition it should be

sentences.english: The giraffe ranges in Africa.
sentences.chinese: 长颈鹿生长在非洲。

sentences.english: The practice still prevails in some parts of Africa.
sentences.chinese: 这种做法在非洲某些地区仍然很盛行。

sentences.english: He traversed alone the whole continent of Africa from east to west.
sentences.chinese: 他只身长途跋涉， 从东向西横穿整个非洲大陆。

sentences.english: eastern Europe
sentences.chinese: 东欧

detailed_translations.english: the continent that is north of the Mediterranean and goes as far east as the Ural Mountains in Russia

sentences.english: fierce guard dogs
sentences.chinese: 凶猛的看门狗

sentences.english: fierce fighting in the city
sentences.chinese: 城里的激烈战斗

detailed_translations.english: a fierce person or animal is angry or ready to attack, and looks very frightening

sentences.english: Two heart attacks in a year. It hasn’t stopped him smoking, though.
sentences.chinese: 一年里心脏病发作了两次，可是那也没让他把烟戒掉。

sentences.english: It sounds like a lot of fun. Isn’t it rather risky though?
sentences.chinese: 听上去很有趣。可是这不是也很危险吗？

detailed_translations.english: used after adding a fact, opinion, or question which seems surprising after what you have just said, or which makes what you have just said seem less true
used to introduce a statement that makes the main statement coming after it seem surprising, unlikely, or unexpected

sentences.english: They were still driving away at the encyclopaedia.
sentences.chinese: 他们仍在孜孜不倦地编写那部百科全书。

sentences.english: I might do an eighth book for charity, a kind of encyclopaedia of the world so that I could use all the extra material that's not in the books ... we'll see!
sentences.chinese: 我可能出于慈善的目的写第八本书，大概是有关这个世界的百科全书，这样我可以使用书中没能出现的所有额外材料······敬请期待！

sentences.english: An encyclopaedia's-worth of knowledge feels trivialised when it can be generated with just a few strokes on the keyboard, just as the live chatter of the world becomes so much waste paper.
sentences.chinese: 当仅靠敲打几下键盘就能创作出那样的作品时，一种百科全书式的学问感瞬间变得微不足道，正如同那对这个世界鲜活的唠叨变成这里的一堆废纸那样。

sentences.english: How then would this dinosaur have moved?
sentences.chinese: 那么这种恐龙要如何移动呢？

sentences.english: Like shark and dinosaur teeth they would break, but then regenerate.
sentences.chinese: 它们就像鲨鱼和恐龙的牙齿一样会断裂，但也会再生。

sentences.english: From there you can look straight down to the dinosaur fossils displayed on the floor below.
sentences.chinese: 从那儿往向下看，你可以看到陈列在地面上的恐龙化石。

detailed_translations.english: one of a group of  reptile s  that lived millions of years ago

sentences.english: The custom of arranged marriages still exists in many countries.
sentences.chinese: 许多国家仍存在包办婚姻的习俗。

sentences.english: Opportunities exist for students to gain sponsorship.
sentences.chinese: 学生有机会获得资助。

sentences.english: Stop pretending that the problem doesn’t exist.
sentences.chinese: 别再假装这个问题不存在了。

sentences.english: We existed on a diet of rice.
sentences.chinese: 我们靠吃大米过活。

detailed_translations.english: to be present in a place or situation

sentences.english: Most companies have suffered a drop in their profits, even very large companies.
sentences.chinese: 大多数公司的利润都出现下滑，甚至连很大的公司也不例外。

sentences.english: It was quite difficult to see, even with the light on.
sentences.chinese: 这很难看得见，即使开着灯也没有用。

sentences.english: He became quite successful and even appeared on a television show once.
sentences.chinese: 他相当成功，甚至还上了一次电视节目。

sentences.english: She did not even bother to phone us.
sentences.chinese: 她甚至连电话都没打给我们。

sentences.english: He never even acknowledged my letter.
sentences.chinese: 他收到我的信甚至从不会告知一声。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize something that is unexpected or surprising in what you are saying

name: harmless
trans: adj无害的，不会导致损伤的

sentences.english: Her brother’s a bit simple, but he’s quite harmless.
sentences.chinese: 她的弟弟有点愚钝，不过他决不会伤害别人。

detailed_translations.english: unable or unlikely to hurt anyone or cause damage

sentences.english: the harmful effects of smoking
sentences.chinese: 吸烟的害处

detailed_translations.english: causing harm

sentences.english: I knocked on the door but nobody answered.
sentences.chinese: 我敲了敲门，但没人应门。

detailed_translations.english: no one

sentences.english: We agreed on a skeleton outline of the proposal.
sentences.chinese: 我们给提案商定了一个基本框架。

detailed_translations.chinese: 骨架，骨骼；纲要；骨瘦如柴的人
detailed_translations.english: the most important parts of something, to which more detail can be added later

detailed_translations.chinese: 骨骼的；骨瘦如柴的；概略的

sentences.english: We followed the footprints of a deer in the snow.
sentences.chinese: 我们追踪雪地里一头鹿的足迹。

detailed_translations.english: a mark made by a foot or shoe

sentences.english: great thinkers such as Kant and Schopenhauer
sentences.chinese: 康德、叔本华等伟大的思想家

detailed_translations.english: someone who thinks carefully about important subjects such as science or  philosophy  , especially someone who is famous for thinking of new ideas

sentences.english: Alexander the Great beat every opponent between Greece and India.
sentences.chinese: 亚历山大大帝打败了希腊和印度之间的每个敌手。

sentences.english: Spain and Greece have not.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙和希腊还没有。

sentences.english: But there are no special arrangements for Greece or for any other country.
sentences.chinese: 但是对于希腊和任何别的国家，我们都不会特别对待。

sentences.english: a jam jar
sentences.chinese: 果酱罐

sentences.english: half a jar of peanut butter
sentences.chinese: 半瓶花生酱

sentences.english: The ship jarred a little.
sentences.chinese: 船轻微震了一下。

sentences.english: The sudden movement jarred the box and it fell off the table.
sentences.chinese: 这突然一动震动了那个箱子，然后它从桌上掉了下去。

detailed_translations.english: a glass container with a wide top and a lid, used for storing food such as jam or honey, or the amount it contains

detailed_translations.chinese: 冲突；不一致；震惊；发刺耳声
detailed_translations.english: If an object jars, or if something jars it, the object moves with a fairly hard shaking movement

sentences.english: He has a cheerful but quiet character.
sentences.chinese: 他的性格乐观文静。

sentences.english: Everyone recognizes Disney’s cartoon characters.
sentences.chinese: 迪士尼的卡通人物尽人皆知。

sentences.english: The whole character of the school has changed.
sentences.chinese: 这所学校的特色已经完全变了。

detailed_translations.english: the particular combination of qualities that makes someone a particular type of person

sentences.english: You shouldn’t read other people’s mail.
sentences.chinese: 你不应该看别人的信件。

sentences.english: He found a mountain of mail waiting for him.
sentences.chinese: 他发现有堆积如山的邮件等着他处理。

sentences.english: She promised to forward my mail to my new address (= send it from your old home or office to your new one ) .
sentences.chinese: 她答应把我的邮件转寄到我的新地址。

sentences.english: He gets sacks of fan mail (= letters from people who admire him ) .
sentences.chinese: 他收到成堆仰慕者的来信。

sentences.english: The weekly newsletter is mailed to women all over the country.
sentences.chinese: 每周一期的简报邮寄给全国各地的妇女。

detailed_translations.english: the letters and packages that are delivered to you
to send a letter or package to someone

sentences.english: She had never seen a real live elephant before.
sentences.chinese: 她以前从未见过活生生的大象。

sentences.english: a coat made of real fur
sentences.chinese: 真皮大衣

sentences.english: Things don’t happen quite that easily in real life.
sentences.chinese: 现实生活中不会动不动就有这样的事情发生。

detailed_translations.english: something that is real is actually what it seems to be and not false or artificial

sentences.english: They arrived while we were having dinner.
sentences.chinese: 他们来时我们正在吃饭。

sentences.english: While she was asleep, thieves broke in and stole her handbag.
sentences.chinese: 她睡着的时候，小偷闯进来偷走了她的手提包。

sentences.english: She met Andy while working on a production of Carmen.
sentences.chinese: 排练《卡门》时，她认识了安迪。

detailed_translations.english: during the time that something is happening
to spend time in a pleasant and lazy way

sentences.english: It’s our job to establish the cause of the fire.
sentences.chinese: 查明起火原因是我们的责任。

sentences.english: There is no cause for alarm.
sentences.chinese: 不必惊慌。

sentences.english: My father fought for the Nationalist cause.
sentences.chinese: 我父亲为民族党的事业而奋斗。

detailed_translations.english: a person, event, or thing that makes something happen

sentences.english: The scandal did his career a lot of harm.
sentences.chinese: 丑闻对他的职业生涯造成很大损害。

sentences.english: Our children deserve protection from harm.
sentences.chinese: 我们的儿童理应得到保护免受伤害。

sentences.english: chemicals that harm the environment
sentences.chinese: 损害环境的化学品

detailed_translations.english: damage, injury, or trouble caused by someone’s actions or by an event
to have a bad effect on something

sentences.english: You shouldn’t believe everything you read.
sentences.chinese: 你不应尽信书上看来的东西。

sentences.english: I believed him, even though his story sounded unlikely.
sentences.chinese: 我相信了他，尽管他的话听上去难以置信。

sentences.english: I don’t believe a word of it (=  I think it is completely untrue  ) .
sentences.chinese: 我一句话也不相信。

sentences.english: Did you honestly believe that I’d be stupid enough to do that?
sentences.chinese: 你真的认为我会傻到做那样的事情吗？。

detailed_translations.english: to be sure that something is true or that someone is telling the truth

sentences.english: If I treat someone with pneumonia he will die of pneumonia.
sentences.chinese: 如果我按肺炎给病人治疗，他一定会死于肺炎的。

sentences.english: Many of us live our lives running behind time, but we only reach it when we die of a heart attack or in a car accident rushing to be on time.
sentences.chinese: 大多数人为了生存拼命的赶时间，但是我们恐怕只能等死于心脏病或者在赶时间的时候葬身车祸才能赶上时间吧。

sentences.english: If I treat someone with pneumonia he will die of pneumonia only.
sentences.chinese: 如果我给肺炎病人治病，他只会死于肺炎。

sentences.english: His father died of heart disease.
sentences.chinese: 他父亲死于心脏病。

sentences.english: She contracted the disease while she was abroad on holiday.
sentences.chinese: 她在国外度假时染上了这种疾病。

detailed_translations.chinese: 病， 疾病； 不健全， 弊端
detailed_translations.english: an illness which affects a person, animal, or plant

sentences.english: The Government are planning further cuts in public spending.
sentences.chinese: 政府正计划进一步削减公共支出。

sentences.english: The US government has tightened restrictions on firearms.
sentences.chinese: 美国政府已经加强了对枪支的管制。

sentences.english: Neither party had the majority necessary to form a government.
sentences.chinese: 两个政党都没有获得组阁所必需的多数票。

sentences.english: strong government
sentences.chinese: 强有力的统治

detailed_translations.english: the group of people who govern a country or state

sentences.english: Dad was up the ladder, repairing the roof.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸在梯子上修补屋顶。

sentences.english: Where can I get my shoes repaired ?
sentences.chinese: 哪儿能修补鞋子？

sentences.english: The church tower is in need of repair.
sentences.chinese: 教堂的塔楼需要修缮。

detailed_translations.english: to fix something that is damaged, broken, split, or not working properly
something that you do to fix a thing that is damaged, broken, or not working

sentences.english: You can use the gym and pool for a fee of £35 a month.
sentences.chinese: 月付35英镑，即可使用健身房和游泳池。

detailed_translations.english: an amount of money that you pay to do something or that you pay to a professional person for their work

sentences.english: the friends they made on the journey
sentences.chinese: 他们在旅途中交下的朋友

detailed_translations.english: an occasion when you travel from one place to another, especially over a long distance
an occasion when you travel from one place to another, especially over a long distance

sentences.english: The captain and crew welcome you aboard.
sentences.chinese: 机长和全体机组人员欢迎各位乘坐本次航班。

sentences.english: He captained the winning team in 1991.
sentences.chinese: 他于1991年率队夺得胜利。

detailed_translations.english: the sailor in charge of a ship, or the pilot in charge of an aircraft
If you captain a team or a ship, you are the captain of it

sentences.english: When does the wedding come off [take place]?
sentences.chinese: 什么时候举行婚礼?

sentences.english: How many of you believe that there are meetings that take place without you?
sentences.chinese: 你们中多少人相信会有会议,在你们不在场时也会举行？

sentences.english: William and Kate, both 28, have so far revealed only that the wedding will take place in either the spring or summer next year with bookmakers tipping July and August as favorites.
sentences.chinese: 威廉和凯特今年都是28岁。迄今为止，两人只透露说婚礼将在明年春天或夏天举行。博彩公司认为七月或八月结婚的可能性较大。

name: navigator
trans: n(飞机、船舶等上的)领航员，驾驶员

sentences.english: That first citation is from 1557 and comes to us from a great navigator and map maker of the time.
sentences.chinese: 这第一条引证出自1557年，而且它还将一位当时伟大的航海家和地理绘图者带入我们的视野。

sentences.english: ‘Are you lost?’ the driver asked.
sentences.chinese: “你迷路了吗？”司机问道。

sentences.english: I got thoroughly lost on the way here.
sentences.chinese: 我来这里时完全迷了路。

sentences.english: a lost child
sentences.chinese: 一个走失的孩子

detailed_translations.english: if you are lost, you do not know where you are and are unable to find your way somewhere

sentences.english: unexplored planets
sentences.chinese: 未经探索的行星

sentences.chinese: 每日飞往迈阿密的航班

sentences.chinese: 请在月底前全额付清。

sentences.chinese: 来这里的参观者自5月起已增至原来的三倍。

sentences.chinese: 难民获准留在英国。

sentences.chinese: 包装盒上的这个标识保证这种食物是有机生产的。

sentences.chinese: 疏导市中心车流的新道路系统

sentences.chinese: 我的钥匙刚刚还在这里，现在却不翼而飞了。

to do what someone in authority tells you to do, or what a law or rule says you must do

sentences.chinese: 她淡淡一笑。

sentences.english: The hotel is modern and comfortably furnished .
sentences.chinese: 这家宾馆很现代化，家具很舒适。

if something happens until a particular time, it continues and then stops at that time

sentences.chinese: 氯被用于污水处理。

sentences.chinese: 仅用水泵将未经处理的污水排入海中是不够的。

sentences.chinese: 在酱汁中再加一点水。

sentences.chinese: 昨晚发生严重的火车相撞事故后，民众要求制定新的安全措施。

sentences.chinese: 钢铁工业

sentences.chinese: …一个头脑冷静、意志坚强的男人。

sentences.chinese: 恐怖分子会改变战术。

sentences.chinese: 对不起，浴室门上没有锁。

sentences.chinese: 这把钥匙开锁不灵活。

sentences.chinese: 你这次测验成绩好吗？

sentences.english: I want to thank everyone who has encouraged and supported me.
sentences.chinese: 我要感谢每一位鼓励和支持过我的人。

sentences.chinese: 她表现得很有责任心。

sentences.chinese: 她总是很有礼貌。

sentences.chinese: 员工们都很棒。

sentences.english: 10 staff were allocated to the task.
sentences.chinese: 10名员工被分派做这项任务。

sentences.chinese: 我们力求为所有的客户提供物有所值的商品和服务。

sentences.chinese: 我们收到了几封顾客表示满意的来信。

sentences.english: He’s one of our regular customers .
sentences.chinese: 他是我们的一个老主顾。

sentences.chinese: 我的办公室就在过道旁边。

sentences.chinese: 我们沿着一条狭窄的通道来到大楼的后面。

sentences.english: an underground passage

sentences.english: The bridge isn’t strong enough to allow the passage of heavy vehicles.
sentences.chinese: 那座桥不够坚固，无法让重型车辆通过。

sentences.chinese: 教师在学期内经常觉得工作担子过重。

detailed_translations.english: a word or expression with a particular meaning, especially one that is used for a specific subject or type of language

sentences.chinese: 第一版于1765年出版。

sentences.english: They are publishing the dictionary on CD-ROM.

sentences.chinese: 我们喜欢阅读大家的来信，并且会尽量刊登出来。

sentences.chinese: 最新的失业数字将于明天公布。

sentences.chinese: 该国第一个民主选举产生的政府

sentences.chinese: 你可以选择删除或者保存信息。

sentences.chinese: 毒品是如今犯罪的主要诱因之一。

sentences.english: The chief reason for this is that people are living longer.
sentences.chinese: 这主要是因为人们更长寿了。

sentences.english: his chief rival for the job
sentences.chinese: 和他竞争这份工作的主要对手

sentences.english: the prosecution’s chief witness
sentences.chinese: 控方的主要证人

sentences.english: She had many reasons for taking the money, but chief among them was revenge.
sentences.chinese: 她拿这笔钱的原因有很多，但最主要的是为了报复。

detailed_translations.english: most important

detailed_translations.chinese: 首领， 长官； 酋长， 族长
detailed_translations.english: the ruler of a tribe

sentences.english: the editor of the Daily Telegraph
sentences.chinese: 《每日电讯报》的主编

detailed_translations.english: the person who is in charge of a newspaper or magazine, or part of a newspaper or magazine, and decides what should be included in it

sentences.english: The zoo asked its visitors to suggest a name for the new baby panda.
sentences.chinese: 动物园请游客提建议，给刚出生的大熊猫起一个名字。

sentences.english: It has been suggested that the manager will resign if any more players are sold.
sentences.chinese: 有人提议，如果再有球员被出售，球队主教练就辞职。

detailed_translations.chinese: 提议，建议；启发；使人想起；显示；暗示
detailed_translations.english: to tell someone your ideas about what they should do, where they should go etc

sentences.english: The advice in the booklet reflects the practical experience we have gained (= experience gained by actually doing something, rather than knowledge from books etc ).
sentences.chinese: 小册子中的建议反映了我们所获得的实践经验。

sentences.english: I had some experience in fashion design.
sentences.chinese: 我有一些时装设计方面的经验。

sentences.english: She was turned down on the grounds of lack of experience.
sentences.chinese: 她因缺乏经验而被拒绝。

sentences.english: The book is based on personal experience .
sentences.chinese: 本书是根据个人经历写成的。

detailed_translations.english: knowledge or skill that you gain from doing a job or activity, or the process of doing this

sentences.english: The book will appeal to young readers.
sentences.chinese: 这本书会吸引年轻读者。

sentences.english: I’ve always been an avid reader (= someone who reads a lot ) .
sentences.chinese: 我向来是一个嗜书如命的人。

sentences.english: a series of graded English readers
sentences.chinese: 一系列分级英语读物

detailed_translations.english: someone who reads books, or who reads in a particular way

sentences.english: We will have to consider your offer carefully.
sentences.chinese: 我们得仔细考虑你的提议。

sentences.english: The local authority considered that the school did not meet requirements.
sentences.chinese: 当地政府认为这所学校达不到要求。

sentences.english: Have you considered my feelings?
sentences.chinese: 你考虑过我的感受吗？

detailed_translations.english: to think about something carefully, especially before making a choice or decision

sentences.english: We stopped off briefly in London.
sentences.chinese: 我们在伦敦短暂停留。

detailed_translations.english: for a short time

sentences.english: Maurice asked me whether I needed any help.
sentences.chinese: 莫里斯问我是否需要帮助。

sentences.english: There were times when I wondered whether or not we would get there.
sentences.chinese: 有时候我也想知道我们能不能做得到。

sentences.english: I didn’t know whether to believe him or not.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道该不该相信他。

sentences.english: The question arose as to whether this behaviour was unlawful.
sentences.chinese: 问题出现了: 这种行为是否不合法？

detailed_translations.english: used when talking about a choice you have to make or about something that is not certain

sentences.english: Do you ever wonder if you made the right decision?
sentences.chinese: 你怀疑过自己所作的决定是否正确吗？

sentences.english: The judges’ decision is final (= it will not be changed ).
sentences.chinese: 法官的裁决是最终判决。

sentences.english: the ability to act with speed and decision
sentences.chinese: 处事迅速果断的能力

detailed_translations.english: a choice or judgment that you make after a period of discussion or thought

sentences.english: When the investigation is concluded, the results will be sent to the US Attorney’s office.
sentences.chinese: 等到调查结束后，结果会被送到联邦检察官办公室。

sentences.english: Francis, having concluded his business with James, left for Miami.
sentences.chinese: 弗朗西斯完成了和詹姆斯的买卖后就去了迈阿密。

detailed_translations.english: to complete something you have been doing, especially for a long time

detailed_translations.chinese: 推断出，推论出；缔结，议定
detailed_translations.english: to decide that something is true after considering all the information you have

sentences.english: a heart monitor
sentences.chinese: 心脏监测仪

detailed_translations.chinese: 班长；监视器，检测器；显示器
detailed_translations.english: a television or part of a computer with a screen, on which you can see pictures or information
to carefully watch and check a situation in order to see how it changes over a period of time

sentences.english: I think London was a good choice as a venue.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得伦敦是个很好的选址。

sentences.english: choice steak
sentences.chinese: 上等牛排

detailed_translations.english: the person or thing that someone chooses
(especially of food) of very good quality

sentences.english: Despite his youth, he had travelled alone.
sentences.chinese: 他虽然年纪还小，却已独自旅行过了。

sentences.english: The youth of today are the pensioners of tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 今天的年轻人就是明天领养老金的人。

detailed_translations.english: the quality or state of being young

sentences.english: He has a lot of talent , and his work is fresh and interesting.
sentences.chinese: 他很有天赋，作品新颖有趣。

sentences.english: a persuasive speaker with a natural talent for leadership
sentences.chinese: 有领导天赋、颇有辩才的演说者

sentences.english: His latest book reveals hidden talents.
sentences.chinese: 他最新的一本书展现了他深藏不露的才能。

sentences.english: Sadly, she inherited none of her father’s musical talent.
sentences.chinese: 可惜的是，她一点都没有继承她父亲的音乐天赋。

sentences.english: He is a great talent.
sentences.chinese: 他是个了不起的人才。

sentences.english: Britain’s footballing talent
sentences.chinese: 英国的足球天才

detailed_translations.english: a natural ability to do something well

sentences.english: You two know each other, I gather.
sentences.chinese: 我想你们俩认识。

detailed_translations.english: to believe that something is true because of what you have seen or heard

name: congratulation
trans: n.（常用复数形式）祝贺；恭喜

sentences.english: letters of congratulation
sentences.chinese: 祝贺信

sentences.english: Give Oscar my congratulations.
sentences.chinese: 请向奥斯卡转达我的祝贺。

detailed_translations.english: when you tell someone that you are happy because they have achieved something or because something nice has happened to them

sentences.english: What have I done to deserve this?
sentences.chinese: 我做了什么事，要得到这样的报应？

sentences.english: I’m sorry for the kids. They deserve better (= deserve to be treated in a better way ) .
sentences.chinese: 我为这些孩子感到难过，他们应该过得更好。

sentences.english: Ledley deserves a place in the team.
sentences.chinese: 莱德利应该在队里占有一席之地。

sentences.english: Paula deserves a special mention for all the help she has given us.
sentences.chinese: 应该特别提一下葆拉，她给了我们许多帮助。

sentences.english: I would never hit anyone, even if they deserved it.
sentences.chinese: 我决不会打人，哪怕他欠揍。

sentences.english: What has he done to deserve this punishment ?
sentences.chinese: 他做了什么，竟会受到这样的惩罚？

sentences.english: People who are sent to prison for drunk-driving get what they deserve .
sentences.chinese: 那些醉酒驾车被送进监狱的人是罪有应得的。

detailed_translations.english: to have earned something by good or bad actions or behaviour

sentences.english: Her screams of delighted laughter filled the air.
sentences.chinese: 她喜悦的尖叫声在空中荡漾。

detailed_translations.english: very pleased and happy

detailed_translations.chinese: 使…兴高采烈；感到快乐（delight的过去分词）

sentences.english: He felt a deep sense of shame.
sentences.chinese: 他深深地感到羞愧。

sentences.english: Maria blushed with shame.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽亚羞得脸都红了。

sentences.english: (= it made her feel ashamed ) , she gained back all the weight she’d lost.
sentences.chinese: 让她感到惭愧的是，她减掉的体重全又长回来了。

sentences.english: He’s brought shame on the whole family.
sentences.chinese: 他使全家蒙羞。

sentences.english: (= it should not make you feel ashamed ) saying ‘I don’t know’.
sentences.chinese: 说一句"我不知道”也没什么可难为情的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 羞耻，羞愧；憾事，带来耻辱的人
detailed_translations.english: the feeling you have when you feel guilty and embarrassed because you, or someone who is close to you, have done something wrong
to make someone feel ashamed

sentences.english: According to official records, five people were killed last year near that road junction.
sentences.chinese: 据官方记录，去年有五人在那个路口附近丧生。

sentences.english: His record reveals a tough streak.
sentences.chinese: 他的经历说明他个性坚强。

sentences.english: Her husband made her record every penny she spent.
sentences.chinese: 她丈夫要她把花的每分钱都记下来。

detailed_translations.english: information about something that is written down or stored on computer, film etc so that it can be looked at in the future
to write information down or store it in a computer or on film so that it can be looked at in the future

sentences.english: black trousers teamed with a bright shirt
sentences.chinese: 配亮色衬衫的黑裤子

sentences.english: You can team up with one other class member if you want.
sentences.chinese: 例句：如果你愿意的话，可以找一个同学组成一组。

detailed_translations.english: to put two things or people together, because they will look good or work well together

sentences.english: The tower was designed by Gilbert Scott.
sentences.chinese: 这座塔楼是吉尔伯特·斯科特设计的。

detailed_translations.english: to make a drawing or plan of something that will be made or built

detailed_translations.chinese: 设计， 构想； 图样； 企图
detailed_translations.english: the art or process of making a drawing of something to show how you will make it or what it will look like

name: feature
trans: n.（报刊、电视等的）专题特写

sentences.english: Air bags are a standard feature in most new cars.
sentences.chinese: 气囊是大多数新车的标准配置。

sentences.english: Striped tails are a common feature of many animals.
sentences.chinese: 尾巴上有条纹是许多动物的共同特征。

sentences.english: The hotel’s only redeeming features (= things that make it acceptable ) were that it was cheap and near the city centre.
sentences.chinese: 这家旅馆仅有的可取之处就是价格低廉并且靠近市中心。

sentences.english: One of the distinguishing features (= features that are different from other things of the same sort ) of modern banking is its dependence on computers.
sentences.chinese: 现代银行业的显著特征之一就是依赖电脑。

sentences.english: It's a great film and it features a Spanish actor who is going to be a world star within a year.
sentences.chinese: 那是一部精彩的电影，它由一位西班牙演员主演，他一年之内就会成为国际明星。

sentences.english: The hour-long programme will be updated each week and feature highlights from recent games.
sentences.chinese: 这个一小时的节目将每周更新，重点介绍近期比赛的精彩部分。

detailed_translations.chinese: 特征，特色；面貌；特写，专题节目；故事片
detailed_translations.english: a part of something that you notice because it seems important, interesting, or typical
When something such as a film or exhibition features a particular person or thing, they are an important part of it

sentences.english: Residents are complaining because traffic in the area has increased.
sentences.chinese: 由于这个地区的交通流量有所增加，居民都在抱怨。

sentences.english: ‘You never ask my opinion about anything,’ Rod complained.
sentences.chinese: “你什么事都不问问我的看法。”罗德抱怨道。

sentences.english: Employees complained bitterly about working conditions.
sentences.chinese: 雇员们对工作条件十分不满。

detailed_translations.english: to say that you are annoyed, not satisfied, or unhappy about something or someone

sentences.english: a committee meeting
sentences.chinese: 委员会会议

detailed_translations.english: a group of people chosen to do a particular job, make decisions etc

sentences.english: In this month’s competition you could win a prize worth £3,000.
sentences.chinese: 在本月的竞赛中您可以赢得价值3,000英镑的奖品。

sentences.english: The first prize has gone to Dr John Gentle.
sentences.chinese: 获得一等奖的是约翰·金特尔博士。

sentences.english: The prizes are awarded (= given ) every year to students who have shown original thinking in their work.
sentences.chinese: 这些奖项每年颁发给在学习中表现出创造性思维的学生。

sentences.english: The total prize money was £30,000.
sentences.chinese: 奖金总额为3万英镑。

detailed_translations.english: something that is given to someone who is successful in a competition, race, game of chance etc
to think that someone or something is very important or valuable
good enough to win a prize or having won a prize

sentences.english: Anne’s sight is very good for someone of her age.
sentences.chinese: 安妮的视力对于她这个年龄的人来说算是非常好的。

sentences.english: He began to lose his sight six years ago.
sentences.chinese: 六年前他开始视力衰退。

sentences.english: an emergency operation to save his sight
sentences.chinese: 挽救他视力的紧急手术

sentences.english: You will get a free sight test if you are under 16.
sentences.chinese: 如果你不满16岁，可以免费检查视力。

detailed_translations.english: the physical ability to see
to see something from a long distance away, or see something you have been looking for

sentences.english: the immortality of the soul
sentences.chinese: 灵魂的不灭

sentences.english: It was as if those grey eyes could see into the very depths of her soul .
sentences.chinese: 仿佛那双灰眼睛能看到她的灵魂深处。

sentences.english: the souls of the dead
sentences.chinese: 亡灵

detailed_translations.english: the part of a person that is not physical, and that contains their character, thoughts, and feelings. Many people believe that a person’s soul continues to exist after they have died.

sentences.english: She balanced the cup on her knee.
sentences.chinese: 她把杯子在膝盖上放稳。

detailed_translations.english: to put your body or sth else into a position where it is steady and does not fall
an instrument for weighing things, with two dishes that hang from a bar

sentences.english: Draw a straight line across the top of the page.
sentences.chinese: 在这一页的上方画一条直线。

sentences.english: Sign your name on the dotted line (= line made up of a series of dots ).
sentences.chinese: 在虚线上签名。

sentences.english: The edges of the pitch are marked by white lines.
sentences.chinese: 球场的四边画着白线。

sentences.english: The goalkeeper just managed to stop the ball going over the line.
sentences.chinese: 守门员刚好把球截住，没有让它越过球门线。

sentences.english: He raced towards the finishing line.
sentences.chinese: 他朝终点线冲刺。

sentences.english: The four men were standing in a line on the other side of the table.
sentences.chinese: 那四个男人在桌子的另一边站成一排。

sentences.english: Light travels in a straight line.
sentences.chinese: 光沿直线传播。

sentences.english: A boat came into my line of vision (= direction I was looking in ).
sentences.chinese: 一艘船进入了我的视线。

detailed_translations.english: a long thin mark on a piece of paper, the ground, or another surface

sentences.english: the great traditions of ancient Greek drama
sentences.chinese: 古希腊戏剧的伟大传统

sentences.english: a new drama series for Saturday nights
sentences.chinese: 周六晚上播放的新连续剧

sentences.english: a drama critic
sentences.chinese: 戏剧评论员

sentences.english: a courtroom drama
sentences.chinese: 法庭剧

sentences.english: a lavish costume drama
sentences.chinese: 豪华古装剧

sentences.english: He plays a Russian spy in the comedy drama ‘Sleepers’.
sentences.chinese: 他在喜剧片《潜伏特工》中扮演一名俄罗斯间谍。

detailed_translations.chinese: 戏剧， 剧本； 戏剧性事件
detailed_translations.english: a play for the theatre, television, radio etc, usually a serious one, or plays in general

sentences.english: She was unsure of her reception after everything that had happened.
sentences.chinese: 发生了这些事后，她对自己是否还受欢迎没把握。

sentences.english: The plans received a mixed reception from unions (= some people liked them, others did not ) .
sentences.chinese: 各工会对这些计划反响不一。

detailed_translations.english: a particular type of welcome for someone, or a particular type of reaction to their ideas, work etc

sentences.english: ‘No!’ she exclaimed in shock.
sentences.chinese: “不！”她惊呼道。

detailed_translations.english: to say something suddenly and loudly because you are surprised, angry, or excited

sentences.english: In Finland purists insist that only birch bark should be added.
sentences.chinese: 在芬兰，纯化论者坚持说只能加白桦树皮。

sentences.english: Cork bark is closely intertwined with the lives of the people in these regions.
sentences.chinese: 软木橡树的树皮与这些地方的百姓生活密切地交织在一起。

sentences.english: In his workshop, a Kakunodate craftsman prepares the cherry bark before applying this as a veneer to a range of objects.
sentences.chinese: 在将这种工艺作为一系列物体的单板运用之前，角馆的工匠在自己的作坊准备樱花树皮。

detailed_translations.english: the outer covering of a tree

sentences.english: a banquet for 250 distinguished guests
sentences.chinese: 250位贵宾出席的宴会

sentences.english: Among the invited guests were Jerry Brown and Elihu Harris.
sentences.chinese: 受邀的嘉宾中有杰里·布朗和伊莱休·哈里斯。

sentences.english: The actress was guest of honour (= the most important guest ) at the launch.
sentences.chinese: 这位女演员是首发式上的贵宾。

sentences.english: I’ve nearly finished the guest list for the wedding.
sentences.chinese: 参加婚礼的嘉宾名单我差不多准备好了。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is invited to an event or special occasion
for guests to use

sentences.english: drinking water supplied by old-fashioned lead pipes
sentences.chinese: 由老式铅管输送的饮用水

detailed_translations.english: a chemical element. Lead is a heavy soft grey metal, used especially in the past for water pipes or to cover roofs.

sentences.english: The managing director wrote personally to thank me.
sentences.chinese: 总经理亲自写信向我表示感谢。

sentences.english: All important work is personally approved by him.
sentences.chinese: 所有重要的工作都由他亲自批准。

sentences.english: I’ll see to it personally.
sentences.chinese: 这件事我要亲自处理。

detailed_translations.chinese: 亲自地；当面；个别地；就自己而言
detailed_translations.english: if you do something personally, you do it yourself rather than getting someone else to do it

sentences.english: She seems very sensible.
sentences.chinese: 她好像很明智。

sentences.english: sensible advice
sentences.chinese: 合理的建议

sentences.english: It’s sensible to keep a note of your passport number.
sentences.chinese: 把你的护照号码记下来是明智的。

sentences.english: Moving house seemed like the sensible thing to do .
sentences.chinese: 搬家似乎是明智的做法。

detailed_translations.english: reasonable, practical, and showing good judgment

sentences.english: The police asked her to describe the man.
sentences.chinese: 警察叫她描述一下那名男子。

sentences.english: Another approach to the problem is described in Chapter 3.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题的另一种解决方法在第三章有所阐述。

detailed_translations.chinese: 形容， 描写； 画出
detailed_translations.english: to say what something or someone is like by giving details about them

sentences.english: I forgot to set the burglar alarm.
sentences.chinese: 我忘记打开防盗警报器了。

sentences.english: Car alarms are always going off in the street.
sentences.chinese: 街上总有汽车警报器在响。

sentences.english: a sophisticated alarm system
sentences.chinese: 精密的警报系统

sentences.english: We could not see what had alarmed him.
sentences.chinese: 我们不明白是什么吓着他了。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment that makes a loud noise to warn you of danger
If something alarms you, it makes you afraid or anxious that something unpleasant or dangerous might happen

sentences.english: Nearly 10% of the Earth’s surface is covered by ice.
sentences.chinese: 地球表面将近 10% 被冰层覆盖。

sentences.english: Gas bubbles in any liquid tend to rise to the surface .
sentences.chinese: 在任何液体中气泡往往都会浮到表面。

detailed_translations.english: the top layer of an area of water or land
relating to the part of the army, navy etc that travels by land or on the sea, rather than by air or under the sea
if someone or something surfaces, they suddenly appear somewhere, especially after being gone or hidden for a long time

sentences.english: Her mother had been dead for ten years.
sentences.chinese: 她母亲去世十年了。

sentences.english: Police are trying to contact the family of the dead man.
sentences.chinese: 警方在设法与死者的家属联系。

sentences.english: a pile of dead leaves
sentences.chinese: 一堆枯叶

sentences.english: the dead body of a young soldier
sentences.chinese: 一名年轻士兵的尸体

sentences.english: Two men were shot dead by terrorists.
sentences.chinese: 两名男子遭恐怖分子枪杀。

sentences.english: Magnus was found dead in his car.
sentences.chinese: 马格纳斯被人发现死在他自己的车里。

sentences.english: One man is still missing, presumed dead .
sentences.chinese: 仍有一人失踪，被推定已经死亡。

sentences.english: He suddenly had a heart attack and dropped dead .
sentences.chinese: 他突发心脏病猝死。

sentences.english: She was pronounced dead on arrival at the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 到达医院时她被宣告已经死亡。

sentences.english: His fellow climbers had left him for dead on the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 他的登山伙伴以为他已死，便把他留在山上走了。

sentences.english: We didn’t know if she was dead or alive.
sentences.chinese: 我们不知道她是死是活。
